name: Veltrixa
description: Veltrix / Veltrixa.ai aims to be an all-in-one, AI + blockchain financial ecosystem. Its core goal is to let users “set and forget” trading via automation, while integrating token rewards, staking, referrals, and other modules like NFTs / gaming. The project positions itself not just as a trading bot but as a full digital wealth infrastructure combining DeFi, trading, and a tokenized economy.Incentives To grow its user base, Veltrix has a program of free VELT token distribution (airdrops) and multi-level referral rewards
